channel.title: South West Trains JourneyCheck Feeds
channel.description: Check for problems on your route

item.title: 16:06 London Waterloo to Hampton Court due 16:44
item.description: This train will no longer call at Raynes Park, New Malden and Berrylands.

item.title: 08:53 Windsor & Eton Riverside to London Waterloo due 09:51
item.description: This train is being delayed at Richmond.

item.title: 12:20 London Waterloo to Exeter St Davids due 15:44
item.description: This train has been delayed at Salisbury and is now 17 minutes late.

item.title: 09:39 London Waterloo to Poole due 12:55
item.description: This train will be starting late from London Waterloo and is expected to be 45 minutes late.

item.title: 08:42 London Waterloo to Shepperton due 09:33
item.description: This train will be delayed from Clapham Junction onwards by up to 1 minute but is expected to be on time at Fulwell.

item.title: Delays to services at Swaythling
item.description: Owing to a line-side fire at Swaythling London bound lines are blocked. Train services through this station may be subject to disruption on all routes at short notice. Disruption is expected until 10:15 17/11.

item.title: Delays to services between Ash Vale and Ascot
item.description: Following a broken down train between Ash Vale and Ascot all lines have now reopened.

item.title: Alterations to services between Wimbledon and London Waterloo
item.description: Owing to congestion between Wimbledon and London Waterloo trains have to run at reduced speed on London bound suburban lines.
